<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Linker relaxation will replace this with R&#95;RISCV&#95;RVC&#95;JUMP or R&#95;RISCV&#95;JAL</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/riscv/#a7e8800193a803fbffb29c072afe09ab7a71c292a54dd4ab86706ecc96fc124d9e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/riscv/#a7e8800193a803fbffb29c072afe09ab7a71c292a54dd4ab86706ecc96fc124d9e">CallRelaxable</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Linker relaxation will use this to ensure all code sequences are properly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// aligned and then remove these edges from the graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/riscv/#a7e8800193a803fbffb29c072afe09ab7ac2e63bb05e50bf29c6a660c4478e03f4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/riscv/#a7e8800193a803fbffb29c072afe09ab7ac2e63bb05e50bf29c6a660c4478e03f4">AlignRelaxable</a>,</span></CodeLine>
